inclusion.criterion: Adult patients with cirrhosis presenting to UAB Endoscopy for surveillance endoscopy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: to detect and grade gastroesophageal varices
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: towards age or race in this trial. The trial is open the accrual of women and men.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Inability to provide written informed consent
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of bleeding gastroesophageal varices, variceal intervention or portosystemic shunt
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Severe chronic kidney disease with estimated glomerular filtration rate (GFR) < 30 mL/min/1.73 m2
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has cirrhosis, grade II esophageal varices, and recent admission for UGIB. He is being referred for new slurred speech and tangential thought process.
